name: email-send
description: AWS Lambda function for sending emails via the bricebentler.com contact form

scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- -R tap "./tests/**/*.js" > ./test.tap && istanbul report clover
scripts.build: artifact=email-send-$(date +%s).zip && mkdir -p build && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && zip -q -r ./build/${artifact} . -x "*config.json.local*" -x "*build*" -x "*tests*" && npm install && echo ${artifact}

author: Brice Bentler <me@bricebentler.com>
